definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The initiation toughness has a linear relationship with stretch zone width in the weldment.
sentences.chinese: 裂纹尖端的延伸区宽度和起裂韧性具有良好的关系。

sentences.english: The eonstant dropping of water wears away the stone. This is Its tenacity, stamina and persistence.
sentences.chinese: 滴水穿石，这就是它的韧性。

sentences.english: The main factor affecting toughness of HAZ is the configuration and distribution of bainite.
sentences.chinese: 影响HAZ韧性的主要因素是贝氏体的形态和分布。

sentences.english: The effect of tiny amount of Titamium on the notch toughness of low carbon boron steel was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了微量钛对低碳硼钢冲击韧性的影响。

sentences.english: We must learn from the tenacious fighting spirit of Lu Xun.
sentences.chinese: 我们要学习鲁迅先生韧性的战斗精神。

sentences.english: It provides higher abrasion resistance compared to tungsten carbide at the expense of some toughness.
sentences.chinese: 它提供了更高的耐磨性比钨在硬质合金牺牲一些韧性。

sentences.english: PUA has good wear resistance and flexibility advantages.
sentences.chinese: 聚氨酯丙烯酸酯具有耐磨性好，柔韧性好的优点。

sentences.english: A material's loss of malleability due to chemical treatment or physical change.
sentences.chinese: 材料由于化学处理或物理变化丧失了柔韧性。

sentences.english: Elite Sanshou players were more pliable than the general players.
sentences.chinese: 优秀散打运动员比一般运动员的坚韧性与总分更好。

sentences.english: Cemented carbide alloys are a material having hardness and high toughness.
sentences.chinese: 超硬合金是具有硬度和高韧性的材料。

sentences.english: And once we applied our studies-- the resilience issue, everyone benefited and continued to benefit from it.
sentences.chinese: 只要将心理韧性研究应用到生活中，每个人受益良多。

sentences.english: This is more flexible than the board last but less supportive.
sentences.chinese: 这种鞋帮柔韧性比第一种好，但是支撑性要差一些。

sentences.english: Good characteristics for toughness and wear resistance.
sentences.chinese: 具有好的耐磨损和韧性。

sentences.english: Gel coat base resin, very good tenacity, suitable for common product gel coat.
sentences.chinese: 胶衣基体树脂，韧性突出，适用于普通产品胶衣。

sentences.english: Kabaeva is known for her extreme natural flexibility.
sentences.chinese: 卡巴耶娃因为身体天生的柔韧性著称。

sentences.english: It is well known that polymers have better toughness, but it lacks bioactivity.
sentences.chinese: 聚合物材料具有较好的韧性，但缺乏生物活性。

definition: (of sth that has been deformed) to spring back to original shape/(fig.) to rebound/to bounce back
